entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0179.10143] The filing has used the DividendsAxis with the member bxp:ReturnOfCapitalMember, but has used the concept bxp:DividendsTreatmentForFederalTaxPurposes multiple times on this axis with different period contexts. The concept bxp:DividendsTreatmentForFederalTaxPurposes has been used mutiple times to capture the values 0 and 0 and 0.4 for the periods 2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31 and 2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 and 2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31. The DividendAxis should use discrete members to represent different dividend events. The same concept should not be used more than once with the same dividend member bxp:ReturnOfCapitalMember.
Rule Element Id:10143 Rule version: 26.0.9 - bxp-20241231.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Dividends treatment for federal tax purposes.
